full_threads.body:
Hi Jaqui,

It is possible that it is the cache. We have cleared the site's cache now on our end. Please clear the cache of your browser before checking it again.
Thanks Rica. Its great now. The only problem is I can only see the What's On posts when using internet explorer and not when using Microsoft edge??

Hi Jaqui,

We have now updated the 'What's On' page. Can you please check it now?
Logged total of 20 mins to Harvest

Hi Jaqui,

Sure. Confirming that we have made the updates. Let us know if you would like further changes.

Actually Rica can you please make the following changes

1. remove the space and lift up the Wellbeing Videos blue header so there isn't as much space between the 'register here' button and the 'wellbeing videos' heading.

2. change the words in the blue header box from 'Wellbeing Videos' to 'Wellbeing Video library'

3. Make this blue box 'Wellbeing Video library' header slimmer

Thanks
